verses.text: Ix in q'uexxi q'uelan, ix vilani to ay jun winh vinac ed'jinac jun ch'anh cuerda.
Ix in k'anb'an t'a winh: ¿B'ajtil tzach b'ati? xin chi. Ix yalan winh t'ayin icha tik: Van in b'at vechtej chonhab' Jerusalén, yic snachajeli jantac sk'atul yet' jantac sat, xchi winh.
Yuj chi', ix vilan sb'at jun ángel van slolon chi' ved'oc. Ay junxo ángel chi' ix elta ul scha'a, ha' ix alan t'ay:

Ixic t'a elanhchamel, al t'a winh quelem chi' icha tik: Ha Jerusalén, manhxo ol yal-laj yoch smuroal, yujto a eb' anima ol cajnajxoc t'ay, manhxo jantacoc ol aj sb'isul eb'. Ol te q'uib'paxchaanh nok' smolb'etzal nok' eb'.
Palta a Jehová tz'alani: Ha in ol in och oyan t'a spatictac Jerusalén chi' icha junok k'ak', icha muro. Ol in ch'ox in tziquiquial t'a skal chonhab' chi', xchi Jehová, xa chi, xchi jun ángel chi'.

Ha Jehová tz'alan icha tik: Ha in ix ex vak' saclemb'at t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal. Palta a ticnaic, swal t'ayex icha tik: Ex aj Sion, elanheccot elanhchamel t'a Babilonia ay t'a stojolal norte b'aj sacleminac eyajcanb'ati, xchi Jehová.

Ha Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, schecan val juntzanh lolonel tik t'a juntzanh nación ix ex pechan saclem a ex schonhab' ex tik. Ha tz'alan icha tik: Yalnhej mach tz'ixtan in chonhab' tik, ichato a snenal yol in sat syixtej. Yuj chi' a in ol vak' oval yet' juntzanh nación chi', a in ol in chec eb' ayoch schecab'oc eb' yic a eb' ol ik'anek' jantac sb'eyumal eb', xchi Jehová. Icha chi' ol aj sch'oxan sb'a stziquiquial Jehová, icha pax chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to ha' ix in checancot val t'ayex.
Ha Jehová tz'alan icha tik: B'itananhec t'a tzalajk'olal ex aj Sion, yujto ol in k'ochoc, ol in cajnaj t'a e cal, xchi Jehová.

Ayic ol ujok jun tik, tzijtum nación ol javok t'a Jehová, ol och schonhab'oc. Ol cajnajnhej Jehová chi' t'a e cal. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to a Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil ix in checancot t'ayex.
Ha Jehová, ol yak' checlaj t'a sat lum lum yictaxoni to a Judá yico', haxo pax Jerusalén sik'b'ilel yuj.
Numk'ajocab' masanil anima t'a yol yib'anhk’inal t'a yichanh Jehová, yujto van scot yuj eb' schonhab', van yelta t'a yol scajnub' yicnhej yaji.
